con:request.name: checkTexts - 200 - 20 texts
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format="">\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text>\r <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#correctText2}</spel:text>
</spel:CheckTextsRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: error_1_UNKNOWN_WORD
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#unknownWord1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#unknownWord2}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: IGNORE_DIGITS_OFF_checktexts
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#wordWithDigit}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#wordWithDigit}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: IGNORE_URLS_OFF_checktexts
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#wordWithDigit}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#URL}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Sending_couple_words
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>${#TestCase#textForCheckEn1}</spel:text> <spel:text>${#TestCase#textForCheckEn2}</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Check_suggestions
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:spel="http://speller.yandex.net/services/spellservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <spel:CheckTextsRequest lang="${#TestCase#lang}" options="${#TestSuite#optionsDefault}" format=""> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <spel:text>birth</spel:text> <spel:text>pixel</spel:text> <spel:text>Bert</spel:text> </spel:CheckTextsRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
